meanings.definition: Containing the most bugs or glitches.
meanings.sent1: This computer program is the buggiest one I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The new update made the software even buggiest than before.
meanings.sent3: Despite its buggiest nature, the game is still enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The buggiest software can sometimes be the most challenging to fix.
meanings.sent5: The buggiest website crashed every time I tried to use it.

meanings.definition: Having the most bugs or glitches.
meanings.sent1: My phone is the buggiest device I own.
meanings.sent2: The buggiest part of the app is the login screen.
meanings.sent3: Even though it's the buggiest, I still prefer this version of the software.
meanings.sent4: The buggiest section of the game always freezes at the worst times.
meanings.sent5: The buggiest car in the fleet constantly needs repairs.

meanings.definition: Causing the most bugs or glitches.
meanings.sent1: The buggiest update caused chaos for all users.
meanings.sent2: The buggiest code in the program led to multiple errors.
meanings.sent3: The buggiest developer always manages to find new issues.
meanings.sent4: The buggiest changes to the system resulted in a complete shutdown.
meanings.sent5: The buggiest plugin crashed the entire website.
